intro.description:
This cheat sheet will demonstrate how to create an update site for a plug-in using PDE.
To learn more about using cheat sheets, click the help button in the top right corner (?).

item.title: Open the plug-in development perspective
item.description:
To open the plug-in development perspective, select Window->Open Perspective->Other... and choose Plug-in Development.
Alternatively, click the following button to perform the task.

item.title: Create the update site
item.description: To create the update site, perform the following steps:

subitem.label: Select "File->New->Project...", and choose "Update Site Project" under the "Plug-in Development" heading
Input "helloworld.site" into the "Project Name" text box on the "Update Site Project" page
Deselect the "Use default location" check box
Note: For the purpose of this cheat sheet we will define a Windows pathname for our update site location. For Unix platforms, adjust accordingly.
Input "C:\helloworld.site" in the "Location" text box and click "Finish"

item.title: Create the update site description
item.description:
The site editor should be open on the Site Map tab.
To create the update site description, perform the following steps:

subitem.label: Select the "Archives" tab
Input "file:///C:/helloworld.site/" into the "URL" text box
Input "Hello World! Update Site" into the "Description" text box
Click "File->Save" from the main menu

item.title: Create a feature category
item.description: To create a feature category, perform the following steps:

subitem.label: Select the "Site Map" tab from the site editor
Click the "New Category" button
Input "Hello World!" into the "ID" text box
Input "Hello World!" into the "Name" text box
Click "File->Save" from the main menu

item.title: Add a feature to a feature category
item.description: To add a feature to a feature category, perform the following steps:

subitem.label: Select the "Hello World!" feature category in the "Managing the Site" list box
Click the "Add Feature..." button
Select "com.example.feature" from the list box and click "OK"
Click "File->Save" from the main menu

item.title: Build and export a feature to an update site
item.description: To build a feature and export it to an update site, perform the following steps:

subitem.label: Click the "Build All" button
Verify the "com.example.helloworld_1.0.0.jar" jar file has been created in the "plugins" folders on the update site (See the "Package Explorer" view or the "C:\helloworld.site" folder)
Verify the "com.example.feature_1.0.0.jar" jar file has been created in the "features" folders on the update site
